content.raw: Then probably the firewall is the issue for not being able to communicate between different PCs? As for browser based support I couldn't find anything that easily gives access to the hydra device. And I am not experienced in writing a wrapper to access the hydra api from a browser ( I found something similar which gived support for oculus and hydra as a chrome extension, however it only worked under windows: https://github.com/benvanik/vr.js/ ).
content.html: Then probably the firewall is the issue for not being able to communicate between different PCs? As for browser based support I couldn't find anything that easily gives access to the hydra device. And I am not experienced in writing a wrapper to access the hydra api from a browser ( I found something similar which gived support for oculus and hydra as a chrome extension, however it only worked under windows: https://github.com/benvanik/vr.js/ ).
